description: Fix the specified ball velocities. As a result, ball motion is constant in the specified directions (fixed velocities are not updated during cycling).

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Fix all components of translational velocity

keywords.name: velocity-z
keywords.description: Fix z-component of translational velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin
keywords.description: Fix all components of angular velocity

keywords.name: spin-x
keywords.description: Fix x-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-y
keywords.description: Fix y-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-z
keywords.description: Fix z-component of angular velocity (3D only)

examples.command: ball fix velocity-x velocity-y velocity-z spin-x spin-y spin-z range position-x -3 -1
examples.description: Fix all velocity and spin components for balls in x-position range
Fix z-velocity for balls in 'bottom_grip' group (common in compression tests)
Fix translational velocity (all components) for balls in y-position range

examples.command: ball fix velocity-x velocity-y range id 1 100
examples.description: Fix x and y velocities (allow z motion) for balls 1-100

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Ball.set_fix(component, True) where component: 0=X, 1=Y, 2=Z, 3=RX, 4=RY, 5=RZ - requires iteration
